WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Thank you for filing this issue. 

We have fixed a number of issues with regards to debugging and I can no longer reproduce this issue. The next release should have this fix.
WorkItem.Description:
Single stepping while debugging, the 'step-line' is out of alignment when crossing from one '.ts' file to another. Also, when placing contiguous breakpoints (one breakpoint in each file), the second breakpoint is not hit. A Map-File alignment issue I assume?
The attached Visual Studio project has a breakpoints set (app.ts line# 54), this should call into (canvas.ts line# 1079) '.  when you step into the canvas file from this breakpoint, the debug-highlighted line is at line# 1064 (about 16 lines above the actual step target).
